thread.title: Billing is broken on staging and test2 (cannot check it on production)
thread.body:
* open billing                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
* try to pay for smth                                                                                                                                                                                                            
* see you paid but history is not updated                                                                                                                                                                                        
* press cancel - seems it was not paid - no billing period                                                                                                                                                                       
* from zed I see that plan is developer and active                                                                                                                                                                               
< http://screencast.com/t/lv0F0GI2 >http://screencast.com/t/lv0F0GI2
